title: Financial Goal Setting
description: This chapter focuses on establishing meaningful financial goals and developing strategies to achieve them through effective planning and monitoring.
learning_objectives: Differentiate between short-term, medium-term, and long-term goals
Identify strategies for prioritizing financial goals
Develop action plans to achieve financial goals
Create systems for tracking progress and adjusting financial plans

skill_builder.title: SMART Goals Worksheet
skill_builder.description: A structured worksheet that guides students through creating Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, and Time-bound financial goals.
